### Q~10~ - The temperature coefficient 
$$Q_{10} = \left( \frac{R_{2}}{R_{1}} \right)^{ \left(\ \frac{10}{T_{2}-T_{1}} \right) }$$  

### ln(Q~10~) - log-transformed Q~10~
$$lnQ_{10} = { \left(\ \frac{10}{T_{2}-T_{1}} \right) }
ln\left( \frac{R_{2}}{R_{1}} \right)$$

### Vln(Q~10~) - sampling variance of ln(Q~10~)
$$VlnQ_{10} = { \left(\ \frac{10}{T_{2}-T_{1}} \right) }^2
\left( \frac{sd_{2}^2}{x^2_{2}n_{2}} + \frac{sd_{1}^2}{x^2_{1}n_{1}} \right)$$

### S~10~ - The coefficient of temperature variation?
$$S_{10} = \left( \frac{sd_{2}}{sd_{1}} \right)^{ \left(\ \frac{10}{T_{2}-T_{1}} \right) }$$  

### ln(S~10~) - variability of change in *R* over 10&deg;C
$$lnS_{10} = { \left(\ \frac{10}{T_{2}-T_{1}} \right) }
ln\left( \frac{sd_{2}}{sd_{1}} \right)$$

### Vln(S~10~) - sampling variance of variability of change in *R* over 10&deg;C
$$VlnS_{10} = { \left(\ \frac{10}{T_{2}-T_{1}} \right) }^2
\left( \frac{1}{2\left( n_{2}-1 \right)} + \frac{1}{2\left(n_{1} - 1\right)} \right)$$
